content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, while my name in this scenario is Peter Schmidt from Germany and not inviting you personally, I am glad you're interested in the apartment in Duisburg. Let's begin discussing the rental price for this wonderful property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Peter Schmidt, as a diligent tenant I aim to secure this 50 square meter apartment at the lowest possible price. Can you share your initial thoughts on the rental cost? I'm open to negotiation to reach an agreeable amount.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you aim for the lowest possible price instead of considering my goal to rent it out for the highest price possible. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
